name: borg
description: BorgBackup is a deduplicating backup program that supports compression and authentication, making backups fast and efficient. It's designed for individuals and sysadmins needing encrypted and space-efficient backups.
features: Deduplication: Save space with intelligent block-level deduplication. Efficient storage.
Compression: Reduce backup size with built-in compression. Faster transfers.
Encryption: Secure backups with strong authentication and encryption. Complete security.
Fast Backups: Incremental backups are quick and efficient. Minimal downtime.
Space Efficient: Only store changed data blocks. Maximize storage.
Cross-Platform: Works on Linux and macOS systems. Universal compatibility.
Remote Backups: Backup to remote servers over SSH. Offsite protection.
Reliable: Battle-tested backup solution trusted by sysadmins. Production-ready.
